abstract: Kim Kyong-Il (Hanja: 金京一,Korean: 김경일, born 11 December 1988 in Pyongyang) is a North Korean international football player. He plays for Rimyongsu in the DPR Korea League.He has played on seven occasions for the North Korean national team. In May, 2010, he was called up to the North Korean 23-man squad for the 2010 FIFA World Cup. He had previously played as part of the North Korean team in the 2008 AFC Challenge Cup.
